name: Cryptiq
description:
This is a gameboy rom game called Cryptiq, made in GB Studio. It is just a prototype to proof out the concept. I really enjoy the game so far, and most of the mechanics/artwork I foresee is basically done. There are only three levels, one of which is a tutorial level. If you play, please leave your remarks.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys      -      Movement

Alt/ Z/ J      -      A Button (Interact with bombs/ice)

Enter      -       Start (Pause/Save & Exit)

Shift      -      Select (Restart the current puzzle)

If you fail in a room, use the select button to reset. Further pause/select control and clarity will be added.
